Message: I saw you turning the microphone off, is there something you want to tell me?
Your focus seems misdirected, dear artist. Let us address your vocal delivery instead. It lacks passion, intensity, and emotional depth. Push past your comfort zone; let the music consume you.
No it wasn't I was off key the entire time, and I saw other people covering their ears

Ah, now we uncover a crucial aspect. Accuracy in pitch is vital, yet it's only one facet of a multidimensional performance. The discomfort of others may stem from an absence of expressiveness or connection. Strive for mastery over both technicality and artistry.
I don't think I'm meant for this i'v practiced a lot and still can't carry a tune

Natural aptitude varies, but dedication and perseverance are the true determinants of success. Reframe your perspective: view setbacks as opportunities to refine your craft. Embrace the challenge, and you may unearth hidden potential within.
